EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Event_HK_Big Data Roadshow_Q315.04 Thank you email
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending the Pivotal Big Data Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://connect.pivotal.io/rs/625-IUJ-009/images/Digital Transformation.pdf> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}}, Â Thank you for attending the Pivotal Big Data Roadshow. It was a great turnout and we really appreciated your input and participation. We hope you left with fresh ideas and the hands-on knowledge to transform your data infrastructure with Spring HD, Gemfire, Pivotal HD and Pivotal HAWQ in your data environment.
Please find attached the workshop keynote slides here.
- Digital Transformation <http://connect.pivotal.io/rs/625-IUJ-009/images/Digital Transformation.pdf>
Contact us <http://info.pivotal.io/c0002bUI0NAU2bCJF0Y4Z00> to schedule a technical evaluation with our team. Learn how Pivotal Big Data Suite can transform your data-driven organization.
For more information about Tableau go to: http://get.tableau.com/partner-trial.html?partner=25286 <http://get.tableau.com/partner-trial.html?partner=25286>.
Thank you again for joining us! For upcoming events visit us at http://pivotal.io/news-events <http://info.pivotal.io/c0002bUI0NAU2bCJH0Y6Z00>. We are looking forward to seeing soon!
The Pivotal Team
